contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox lake | lake_name = Mittry Lake | image_lake = MittryLake01.jpg | caption_lake = | image_bathymetry = | caption_bathymetry = | location = [[Yuma County, Arizona]] | coords = {{coord|32|49|38|N|114|27|14|W|region:US-AZ_type:waterbody|display=inline,title}} | type = | inflow = | outflow = | catchment = | basin_countries = United States | length = | width = | area = {{convert|750|acre|ha|abbr=on}} | depth = {{convert|8|ft|abbr=on}} | max-depth = | volume = | residence_time = | shore = | elevation = {{convert|185|ft|abbr=on}} | islands = | cities = }} [[Image:MittryLake02.jpg|thumb|250px|Mittry Lake Boat Dock]] '''Mittry Lake''' is located in the southwest corner of [[Arizona]], just north of [[Yuma, Arizona|Yuma]] on the Lower [[Colorado River (U.S.)|Colorado River]]. It is located in between the upstream [[Imperial Dam]] and the downstream [[Laguna Diversion Dam|Laguna Dam]]. Mittry Lake comprises about {{convert|750|acre|ha}}, with much of the shoreline covered with cattails and [[Typha|bullrush]]. The lake has undergone [[Land rehabilitation|rehabilitation]] work including [[marsh]] [[dredging]], [[revegetation]] and fish [[habitat]] improvement, making it a great location for small game [[hunting]] and sport [[fishing]]. It is public land managed by both the [[Arizona Game and Fish Department]] and [[Bureau of Land Management]], and available to the public for recreational purposes. ==Fish species== *[[Largemouth Bass]] *[[Crappie]] *[[Bullhead catfish]] *[[Catfish]] (Channel) *[[Catfish]] (Flathead) *[[Tilapia]] *[[Redear Sunfish]] *[[Green Sunfish]] *[[Bluegill]] Sunfish *[[Carp]] *[[Bullfrogs]] ==La Laguna== La Laguna was a mining town that was in existence for a short time from 1860 to 1862. The town had a few merchants and a [[ferry]] across the Colorado River that served placer miners in the vicinity. When the [[La Paz, Arizona|La Paz]] gold rush began, La Laguna was abandoned. Its former site now lies beneith Mittry Lake. ==External links== * [http://greennature.com/travel/visit14.html Green Nature Link on Mittry Lake] * [http://www.ghosttowns.com/states/az/lalaguna.html Ghost Towns of Arizona - LA LAGUNA] [[Category:Reservoirs in Yuma County, Arizona]] [[Category:Ghost towns in Arizona]] [[Category:Former populated places in Yuma County, Arizona]] [[Category:Bureau of Land Management areas in Arizona]] {{Arizona-geo-stub}} {{US-ghost-town-stub}}
